mapper.select: SELECT sum(CASE WHEN ad.RealId is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as TypeNum,at.TypeName FROM TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_ALARM_TYPE at ON (at.TypeCode = ad.AlarmCode AND ad.TargetCode='0') GROUP BY at.TypeName union SELECT sum(CASE WHEN ad.RealId is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),mt.TargetName FROM TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt ON (ad.TargetCode LIKE mt.TargetCode+'%' ) WHERE len( mt.LevelCode)=6 GROUP BY mt.TargetName

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT top 5 ci.UniqueCode,ci.CompanyId,ci.CompanyName,SUM(CASE WHEN ad.RealId is not null THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as AlarmNum FROM TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci LEFT JOIN TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad on ad.EquipCode LIKE ci.UniqueCode+'%'
GROUP BY ci.UniqueCode,ci.CompanyId,ci.CompanyName ORDER BY AlarmNum desc)as a WHERE a.AlarmNum!=0

SELECT mt.TargetName, stuff(( SELECT ',' + CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN ad.RealId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS VARCHAR ) FROM TB_REALTIME_ALARM_DATA ad RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_EQUIP_TYPE et ON ( ad.EquipType LIKE et.TypeCode + '%' AND ad.TargetCode LIKE mt.TargetCode+ '%' ) WHERE len( et.LeveCode ) = 6 GROUP BY et.TypeCode, et.TypeName, et.TypeOrder ORDER BY et.TypeOrder FOR xml path ( '' )), 1, 1, '' ) as numList FROM TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt WHERE len(mt.LevelCode)=6
SELECT TypeName FROM TB_BASE_EQUIP_TYPE et WHERE len(et.LeveCode)=6 ORDER BY et.TypeOrder

SELECT mt.TargetName,da.AlarmCount,da.AlarmDate FROM TB_STATIS_DAY_ALARM da JOIN TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt on da.AlarmType LIKE mt.TargetCode +'%' WHERE Len(mt.LevelCode)=6 AND da.IDCode='ZB' union SELECT at.TypeName,da.AlarmCount,da.AlarmDate FROM TB_STATIS_DAY_ALARM da JOIN TB_BASE_ALARM_TYPE at on da.AlarmType = at.TypeCode WHERE da.IDCode='ZT'
SELECT at.TypeName FROM TB_BASE_ALARM_TYPE at UNION ALL SELECT mt.TargetName FROM TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt where len(mt.LevelCode)=6

SELECT TOP 5 sda.DictName, STUFF( ( SELECT ',' + taba.num FROM ( SELECT CAST ( isnull(ma.AlarmNum, 0) AS VARCHAR ) AS num FROM TB_STATIS_INDUSTRY_MONTH_ALARM ma RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_ALARM_TYPE AT ON ( [at].TypeCode = ma.AlarmType AND ma.IDCode = 'ZT' AND ma.IndustryId=sda.DictId AND ma.MonthDay=cast(year(getdate()) as Varchar)+'-'+cast( datename(month,getdate()) as Varchar) )
UNION ALL SELECT CAST ( isnull(ma.AlarmNum, 0) AS VARCHAR ) FROM TB_STATIS_INDUSTRY_MONTH_ALARM ma RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt ON ( mt.TargetCode LIKE ma.AlarmType + '%' AND ma.IDCode = 'ZB' AND ma.IndustryId=sda.DictId AND ma.MonthDay=cast(year(getdate()) as Varchar)+'-'+cast( datename(month,getdate()) as Varchar) ) WHERE LEN(mt.LevelCode) = 6 ) AS taba FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' ) AS DataNum,
(SELECT SUM(taba.num) FROM ( SELECT
isnull(ma.AlarmNum, 0) AS num FROM TB_STATIS_INDUSTRY_MONTH_ALARM ma RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_ALARM_TYPE AT ON ( [at].TypeCode = ma.AlarmType AND ma.IDCode = 'ZT' AND ma.IndustryId=sda.DictId AND ma.MonthDay=cast(year(getdate()) as Varchar)+'-'+cast( datename(month,getdate()) as Varchar) )
UNION ALL SELECT
isnull(ma.AlarmNum, 0)
FROM TB_STATIS_INDUSTRY_MONTH_ALARM ma RIGHT JOIN TB_BASE_MONITOR_TARGET mt ON ( mt.TargetCode LIKE ma.AlarmType + '%' AND ma.IDCode = 'ZB' AND ma.IndustryId=sda.DictId AND ma.MonthDay=cast(year(getdate()) as Varchar)+'-'+cast( datename(month,getdate()) as Varchar) ) WHERE LEN(mt.LevelCode) = 6 ) AS taba ) AS total
FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sda WHERE sda.TypeId='29485cb6-bf2e-4892-ab3a-083ffbb2e6f9'
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT dataTable.data, STUFF( ( SELECT ',' + CAST ( isnull(ma.AlarmCount, 0) AS VARCHAR ) FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd LEFT JOIN TB_STATIS_AREA_MONTH_ALARM ma ON ( sd.DictId = ma.Area AND ma.MonthDate = dataTable.data ) WHERE sd.TypeId = '8b4524ce-15cf-404a-8182-a7e8a8d68343' GROUP BY sd.DictOrder, ma.AlarmCount ORDER BY sd.DictOrder FOR xml path ('') ), 1, 1, '' ) AS alarmNum FROM ( SELECT CAST (YEAR(getdate()) AS VARCHAR) + '-' + CAST ( datename(MONTH, getdate()) AS VARCHAR ) AS data UNION SELECT CAST (datename(year,DATEADD(month, -1, getdate())) AS VARCHAR) + '-' + CAST ( datename(month,DATEADD(month, -1, getdate())) AS VARCHAR )
)as dataTable ORDER BY dataTable.data desc

SELECT MonthDay,CAST(SUM(AlarmNum) AS VARCHAR )AS alarmCount FROM TB_STATIS_INDUSTRY_MONTH_ALARM ma WHERE MonthDay>CAST (datename(year,DATEADD(month, -6, getdate())) AS VARCHAR) + '-' + CAST ( datename(month,DATEADD(month, -6, getdate())) AS VARCHAR ) GROUP BY MonthDay ORDER BY MonthDay DESC
